changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE metrics ( id int4 auto_increment NOT NULL, name varchar NOT NULL, value varchar NOT NULL, type varchar NOT NULL, description varchar NULL, blocker boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false, metric_value_type varchar NULL, metric_validation varchar NULL, CONSTRAINT metrics_pk PRIMARY KEY (id) );

changeSet.author: initial
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE departments ( id int4 NOT NULL, name varchar NOT NULL, coverage real, trend real NULL, expiry_date timestamp, company_id int4 NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT departments_pk PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT department_company_fk FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES companies(id) );

changeSet.author: initial
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE component_type_architectures ( id int4 auto_increment NOT NULL, component_type varchar NOT NULL, network varchar NOT NULL, deployment_type varchar NOT NULL, platform varchar NOT NULL, architecture varchar NOT NULL, language varchar NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT component_type_architectures_pk PRIMARY KEY (id) );

changeSet.author: initial
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE squads ( id int4 NOT NULL, name varchar NOT NULL, coverage real, trend real NULL, expiry_date timestamp, department_id int4 NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT squads_pk PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT squads_department_fk FOREIGN KEY (department_id) REFERENCES departments(id) ON DELETE CASCADE );

changeSet.author: initial
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE component_type_architecture_metrics ( component_type_architecture_id int4 NOT NULL, metric_id int4 NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT component_type_architecture_metrics_pk PRIMARY KEY (metric_id, component_type_architecture_id), CONSTRAINT component_type_architecture_metric_metric_fk FOREIGN KEY (metric_id) REFERENCES metrics(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT component_type_architecture_metric_component_type_architecture_fk FOREIGN KEY (component_type_architecture_id) REFERENCES component_type_architectures(id) ON DELETE CASCADE );

changeSet.author: initial
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE components ( id int4 auto_increment NOT NULL, name varchar NOT NULL, coverage real, trend real NULL, blocked boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false, expiry_date timestamp, component_type_architecture_id int4 NOT NULL, squad_id int4 NOT NULL, analysis_date timestamp, delete_date timestamp, delete_user varchar, CONSTRAINT components_pk PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT components_squad_component_name_uk UNIQUE (name,squad_id), CONSTRAINT component_component_type_architecture_fk FOREIGN KEY (component_type_architecture_id) REFERENCES component_type_architectures(id), CONSTRAINT component_squad_fk FOREIGN KEY (squad_id) REFERENCES squads(id) );

changeSet.author: initial
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE metric_values ( id int4 auto_increment NOT NULL, metric_id int4 NOT NULL, component_type_architecture_id int4 NOT NULL, metric_value_date timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), metric_value_weight int4 NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, metric_expected_value varchar NOT NULL, metric_good_value varchar NULL, metric_perfect_value varchar NULL, CONSTRAINT metric_values_pk PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT metric_value_metrics_fk FOREIGN KEY (metric_id) REFERENCES metrics(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT metric_value_component_type_architecture_fk FOREIGN KEY (component_type_architecture_id) REFERENCES component_type_architectures(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT metric_value_component_type_architecture_metrics_fk FOREIGN KEY (metric_id,component_type_architecture_id) REFERENCES component_type_architecture_metrics(metric_id,component_type_architecture_id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE );

changeSet.author: initial
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE component_analysis ( component_id int4 NOT NULL, analysis_date timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), metric_id int4 NOT NULL, value varchar NULL, blocker boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false, component_type_architecture_id int4 NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT component_analysis_pk PRIMARY KEY (component_id,analysis_date,metric_id), CONSTRAINT component_analysis_component_fk FOREIGN KEY (component_id) REFERENCES components(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT component_analysis_component_type_architecture_metrics_fk FOREIGN KEY (metric_id,component_type_architecture_id) REFERENCES component_type_architecture_metrics(metric_id,component_type_architecture_id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE );

changeSet.author: initial
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE component_properties ( id int4 auto_increment NOT NULL, name varchar NOT NULL, value varchar NOT NULL, component_id int4 NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT component_properties_pk PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT component_properties_uk UNIQUE (name, component_id), CONSTRAINT component_properties_component_fk FOREIGN KEY (component_id) REFERENCES components(id) ON DELETE CASCADE );

changeSet.author: initial
initial
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE component_historical_coverages ( component_id int4 NOT NULL, historical_coverage_date timestamp NOT NULL, historical_coverage_vaue real NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT component_historical_coverage_pk PRIMARY KEY (component_id, historical_coverage_date), CONSTRAINT component_historical_coverage_component_fk FOREIGN KEY (component_id) REFERENCES components(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE );

changeSet.author: initial
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE component_type_architecture_metrics_properties ( id int4 auto_increment NOT NULL, component_type_architecture_id int4 NOT NULL, metric_id int4 NOT NULL, name varchar NOT NULL, value varchar NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT comp_type_arch_metr_prop_pk PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT comp_type_arch_metr_prop_metrics_fk FOREIGN KEY (metric_id) REFERENCES metrics(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT comp_type_arch_metr_prop_comp_type_arch_fk FOREIGN KEY (component_type_architecture_id) REFERENCES component_type_architectures(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT comp_type_arch_metr_prop_comp_type_arch_metrics_fk FOREIGN KEY (metric_id,component_type_architecture_id) REFERENCES component_type_architecture_metrics(metric_id,component_type_architecture_id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE );

changeSet.author: initial
initial
initial
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE component_tags ( component_id int4 NOT NULL, tag_id int4 NOT NULL, owner varchar NULL, analysis_tag boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false, CONSTRAINT component_tags_pk PRIMARY KEY (component_id,tag_id), CONSTRAINT component_tags_component_fk FOREIGN KEY (component_id) REFERENCES components(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT component_tags_tag_fk FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES tags(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE );

changeSet.author: initial
changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW summary_view AS SELECT c.id, c.name, c.coverage, 'COMPONENT'::text AS element_type FROM components c UNION SELECT s.id, s.name, s.coverage, 'SQUAD'::text AS element_type FROM squads s UNION SELECT d.id, d.name, d.coverage, 'DEPARTMENT'::text AS element_type FROM departments d;
